query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS escalation_webhook_configs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  channel_type ENUM('slack', 'teams', 'discord', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  webhook_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  slack_channel VARCHAR(100),
  slack_mentions TEXT,
  teams_title VARCHAR(200),
  custom_headers TEXT,
  custom_body_template TEXT,
  include_details BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  include_chart BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  updated_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_webhook_config_active (is_active),
  INDEX idx_webhook_config_type (channel_type)
);

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  channel_type ENUM('slack', 'teams', 'discord', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  webhook_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  slack_channel VARCHAR(100),
  slack_mentions TEXT,
  teams_title VARCHAR(200),
  custom_headers TEXT,
  custom_body_template TEXT,
  include_details BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  include_chart BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  updated_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_webhook_config_active (is_active),
  INDEX idx_webhook_config_type (channel_type)
);
